basics.name: Luis Fernando Martinez
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience
basics.summary: Developer with 4 years of work experience contributing in projects of different types ranging from Front-end using ReactJS, NextJS, VueJS, Svelte, among others, layout, REST API integrations, GraphQL, also supporting in Back-end projects using native NodeJS with Express and some ORM for database management, or complex Back-ends with NestJS. I also have experience in mobile app development using React Native + Expo.

work.name: Reservándonos
work.summary: I developed web interfaces using VueJS, enhancing interactivity and user experience. I implemented website internationalization, allowing its use in multiple languages and expanding its global reach. I translated web designs from Figma to code, ensuring design fidelity and responsiveness across various devices. I integrated REST APIs to connect the front-end with backend services, optimizing data flow and website functionality. I optimized the code, improving the performance and maintainability of the project.

work.name: Orbis Data
work.summary: I participated in the design of mockups to present to the client the proposal of the web interface of the internal system, using tools such as Figma. I made the layout of web interfaces with technologies such as Typescript, React, Mui, Tailwind, Axios, Node.js, HTML and CSS, following web quality and accessibility standards. I integrated the internal system with the Alfresco content management system, using its REST API. I used tools like Docker and SonarLint to facilitate development, deployment and code review.

work.name: Arcangel Soluciones
work.summary: Place where I acquired and developed myself as a fullstack developer, using the required technologies for the different projects I was assigned. I worked on several projects, leading the UI/UX design, layout, project design pattern and methodologies used. I applied SOLID principles for React, which improved code maintenance. In addition, I optimized by 20% the performance of applications already in production, correcting bad practices, improving the project structure and applying good code partitioning.

education.description: A technical professional in Information Systems who can perform analysis, evaluation, design, development and implementation of IT solutions, as well as operate and manage projects of different levels and complexity with effectiveness and efficiency.

projects.name: Reservándonos
projects.description: Reservation platform for places, events, and services.

projects.name: Ezylegal
highlights: Web and backend maintenance with NextJS and NestJS

projects.name: Podcasts APP
projects.description: Mobile application for listening to podcasts.

projects.name: Wencold
